data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Warangal, Telangana, India.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Warangal, Telangana, India
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Father, help the 9,133 believers in Warangal to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Father, bring yourself glory in Warangal. Through your servants plant 166 new churches that love you, love one another, and make disciples this year.
data.verse: For the earth will be filled with the knowledge of the glory of the LORD as the waters cover the sea.

data.prayer: Father, it’s possible most of the 811,092 lost people in  Warangal, Telangana, India have never held or opened a Bible. Please change this, Father.
data.verse: Yet faith comes from listening to this Good News—the Good News about Christ.

data.prayer: Lord, please remember the Pagativeshagallu people. you said you wanted worshippers of every tongue and tribe and nation, yet we know of no worshippers among them.
Spirit, teach the 9,133 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.

data.prayer: Jesus, please find the broken hearted among the 830,300 souls in Warangal and mend their wounds.
data.verse: He heals the brokenhearted and binds up their wounds.

data.section_summary:
the county of Warangal, Telangana, India has a population of 830,300.

We estimate Warangal has 9,133 people who might know Jesus, 10,074 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 811,092 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 90 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, please give new believers a yearning to see you praised in Warangal, Telangana, India.
data.verse: Declare his glory among the nations, his marvelous deeds among all peoples.

location.name: Warangal
location.people_groups_list: Balija Bogam, Kasar (Hindu traditions), Bindla, Brahmin Telaganya, Banjara Charan
location.people_groups_list_w_pop: Balija Bogam (75,000), Kasar (Hindu traditions) (651,000), Bindla (15,000), Brahmin Telaganya (207,000), Banjara Charan (111,000)
